wikipedia_page.main: David Mark Ritchie (born 20 January 1971) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League for Stockport County.

response: *David Ritchie (politician) (1812–1867), Republican member of the U.S. House of Representatives
*Black Dwarf (personage) (1740–1811), born as David Ritchie, a dwarf, the inspiration for Sir Walter Scott's novel The Black Dwarf
*David Ritchie (moderator) (1763–1844), moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland, 1814/15
